title: SET_PLAYER_TALKING_OVERRIDE
content:
0xFC02CAF6// SetPlayerTalkingOverride
void SET_PLAYER_TALKING_OVERRIDE(Player player, BOOL state);Parameters:player: The target player.state: Overriding state.the status of default voip system. It affects on NETWORK_IS_PLAYER_TALKING and mp_facial animation.
This function doesn't need to be called every frame, it works like a switcher.
codeBlocks:
// SetPlayerTalkingOverride
void SET_PLAYER_TALKING_OVERRIDE(Player player, BOOL state);

local player = PlayerId()
-- Example usage for SET_PLAYER_TALKING_OVERRIDE
SetPlayerTalkingOverride(player, false)
